textBeforeTable: *Please note that textbook prices are subject to change without notice. Please note that this listing provides information for those courses in which faculty members have ordered course materials through the UIC Bookstore. If you do not see a listing for your course, please visit the UIC Bookstore Web site at uic.verbacompare.com or contact your instructor.
